# AstroType - THREE.js Typing Tutor Game

## Project Overview
AstroType is a space-themed typing tutor game built with THREE.js. Players type words that appear on a 3D orb in a cosmic environment.

## Development Setup
- Modern web application using THREE.js for 3D graphics
- Vanilla JavaScript with ES6 modules
- Vite for development and build tooling
- CSS3 for styling and animations
